filters_bidim module

Various 2D filters working on numpy arrays

filters_bidim.boxcar_filter(img, lx)

boxcar (running mean) filter

filters_bidim.boxcar_kernel_weights(lx)

compute boxcar kernel weights

filters_bidim.gaussian_filter(img, sigma)

gaussian filter

filters_bidim.gaussian_kernel_weights(sigma)

compute gaussian kernel weights

filters_bidim.lanczos_filter(img, lx, width_factor=3)

lanczos filter

filters_bidim.lanczos_kernel_weights(lx, width_factor)

compute lanczos kernel weights

filters_bidim.lee_filter(img, lx)

filter following Lee, 1980

filters_bidim.loess_apply_selection(arr, idx)

return array at selected positions

filters_bidim.loess_distance(x, positions)

compute ditances between x and positions

filters_bidim.loess_estimation(beta, x)

estimation au point courant

filters_bidim.loess_filter(img, degree, length, kernel)

2d loess filter adapted from https://github.com/arokem/lowess/blob/master/lowess/lowess.py

filters_bidim.loess_find_selection(d, l)

find positions where d <= l

filters_bidim.loess_inversion(x, y, w, degree)

inversion moindres carrés

filters_bidim.loess_meshgrid(x, y)
filters_bidim.loess_weights(d, kernel='tricube')

compute distance based weights

filters_bidim.median_filter(img, size)

median filter based on scipy.ndimage.generic_filter
